title: FREELANCE INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR AGREEMENT – Simplified Summary
points: This Agreement was signed on 22 August 2025 (Effective Date).
Parties involved:

Purpose: Parties involved: o Creative Canvas Studios, a partnership firm registered under the Indian Partnership o For Creative Canvas Studios o Mr
During discussions, both parties may exchange confidential information (Obligations of the Receiving Party: o Keep the information in strict confidence and protect it like its own confidential data)
Obligations of the Receiving Party:
o Keep the information in strict confidence and protect it like its own confidential data
o Not share it with any third party without the written consent of the Disclosing Party
o Use it only for the Purpose and nothing else
o Share it only with employees, directors, advisors, or consultants who need to know, provided they also follow confidentiality obligations
Exclusions from Confidential Information: Information is not confidential if:
o It is already public or becomes public without fault of the Receiving Party
o The Receiving Party already had it legally before disclosure
o It is developed independently by the Receiving Party
o Disclosure is required by law, regulation, or court order (with prior written notice to the Disclosing Party)
Term: This Agreement is effective for 3 years from the Effective Date
Confidentiality obligations continue for 5 years after termination
On termination or written request, the Receiving Party must return or destroy all confidential documents and copies
No rights or licenses (patents, copyrights, trademarks, or IP) are granted under this Agreement
Governing Law & Jurisdiction:
o Governed by the laws of India
o Courts in Mumbai have exclusive jurisdiction
Dispute Resolution:
o Any disputes will be settled by arbitration under the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996
o Arbitration will be conducted by a sole arbitrator chosen by mutual consent
o Seat of arbitration: Mumbai, India
o Arbitration language: English
General Provisions:
o This Agreement is the entire understanding and replaces all earlier discussions
o If any part is unenforceable, the rest remains valid
